featured.text: Emma and Joe are looking for a live-in babysitter for their three-year-old twins, one who knows how to cook.

definition.zh_def: 臨時照顧小孩的人，通常在父母不在時負責照顧孩子。
definition.en_def: A person who is paid to take care of children temporarily, especially when the parents are away.
definition.example: She hired a babysitter for the evening so she could go out with her friends.
